channel.title: Client error, "connection error, retrying in 20..19..18..etc" help!
channel.description: when i run my client for my server it says connection error, retrying in 19..18..17..16..etc. how do i fix this? i got this problem after uploading it to uppit. this is a delta-scape base if that helps with any thing and im using an edited 317 client.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2009, 08:12:48 pm[/size][hr]does any1 got any ideas? pls help ive spent 5 days adding customs and stuff, i need this to work

item.title: Client error, "connection error, retrying in 20..19..18..etc" help!
item.dc:creator: @Chase2 Chase™
item.description:
@Chase2 wrote:

when i run my client for my server it says connection error, retrying in 19…18…17…16…etc. how do i fix this? i got this problem after uploading it to uppit. this is a delta-scape base if that helps with any thing and im using an edited 317 client.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2009, 08:12:48 pm[/size][hr]does any1 got any ideas? pls help ive spent 5 days adding customs and stuff, i need this to work
